[ 5 ] KPMG has three lines of services: financial audit , tax, and advisory . [ 6 ] Its tax and advisory services are further divided into various service groups. In the 21st century, various parts of the firm's global network of affiliates have been involved in regulatory actions as well as lawsuits.
